long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bulk Slack DMs extension lets you send direct messages en masse.
It saves you from copying and pasting repeatedly. Not to mention a bunch of mouse clicks.

Disclaimer: This is a paid product.

Instructions:
1. Install the extension
2. Get a license (It's free right now.)
3. Enter in the recipient emails in a CSV file and submit it to the extension.
4. Craft your message. You can also send it as an attachment or a block. See https://app.slack.com/block-kit-builder/ for more info.
5. Click on the "Bulk DMs" button.
